posters.title: Unsupervised Promptable Defect Segmentation in Laser Additive Manufacturing
posters.bodyText:
- Poster presenting an unsupervised framework for defect (porosity) segmentation in Laser Additive Manufacturing using the Segment Anything Model (SAM).
- Uses clustering-based prompt generation on XCT images, SAM-based segmentation, and bootstrapped uncertainty quantification to achieve high Dice scores without supervised fine-tuning.
